DataElement.preferredName: Scoliosis Quality of Life Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A congenital or acquired spinal deformity characterized by lateral curvature of the spine._The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time.
